Module it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher
Package it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.utils.message.servermessage

Class InfoMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.utils.message.servermessage.InfoMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, ServerMessage, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChangeInfluenceMessage, ChangePhaseMessage, ChangeTurnMessage, CloudTilesInfoMessage, DisconnectionMessage, EmptyBagMessage, GameInfoMessage, GenericMessage, InfoAssistantCardPlayedMessage, InfoCharacterCardPlayedMessage, InfoChosenCloudTileMessage, InfoStudentIntoDiningRoomMessage, InfoStudentOntoIslandMessage, InfoWithReceiverMessage, LobbyMessage, MergeIslandsMessage, MotherNaturePositionMessage, MoveTowerOntoIslandMessage, MoveTowerOntoSchoolBoardMessage, TieMessage, UpdateIslandWithNoEntryTilesMessage, WinMessage
public abstract class InfoMessage extends Object implements ServerMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages that are sent by the server to communicate some updates to all clients. This is not an interface because we want to distinguish InfoMessage and InfoMessageWithReceiver and the accept method implemented in InfoMessage and InfoMessageWithReceiver allows doing so. If an interface is used, the accept method for InfoMessageVisitor should be implemented in every subclass of InfoMessage, causing code duplication.
